messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Colorado Trip
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kendrah, Thanks for replying. I didn t hear from anyone else. As it happens we ve decided to not rent a car for the first few days. We re in a downtown
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kendrah,

Thanks for replying. I didn't hear from anyone else.

As it happens we've decided to not rent a car for the
first few days. We're in a downtown hotel and it was
expensive to park the car. I've figured out how to go
to the zoo and the science museum by bus. But
restricted mobility means we'll probably be spending a
lot of time by the hotel pool.

Manisha

--- kendrahn79 <carebear-79@...> wrote:

> Hi Manisha,
>
> Sorry for the delay in responding I've been behind
> on emails. Have you been contacted by any
> other Colorado folks? I live near Denver. I don't
> belong to any Unschooling groups yet
> though, so I'm unsure about any park days they have.
> If you'd like to meet up and put a face
> with the name I'd be happy to do that. Our kids are
> different ages (mine are 4 & 15 months)
> but I'm sure if we find a park to meet at they will
> stay entertained:) Well maybe not my 15
> month old who I will likely be chasing after! Anyway
> if you'd like to meet or just want some
> info about Denver please let me know.
>
> Kendrah
> (If you pull my name up on the USBasics archives
> you'll seem some of my posts to figure out
> who I am)
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
